markdownRemark.html:
Understanding do.call function

BE AWARE

This is still Work-in-Progress :) Keep visiting for further updates.

Problem statement

We have list of data frames and we’d like to combine them into single one. How would you approach it?

do.call

do.call function can be used to invoke function f passing parameters contained in a list. The final call looks like this do.call("f", list).

Solution

f == “rbind”, list == our list of data frames; q.e.d
